mapper.sql: full_short_url, gid, date, cnt, os, create_time, update_time, del_flag
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_link_os_stats ( ) VALUES (#{linkOsStats.fullShortUrl}, #{linkOsStats.gid}, #{linkOsStats.date}, #{linkOsStats.cnt}, #{linkOsStats.os}, NOW(), NOW(), 0) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE cnt = cnt + #{linkOsStats.cnt}
mapper.select: SELECT os, SUM(cnt) AS cnt FROM t_link_os_stats WHERE full_short_url = #{param.fullShortUrl} AND gid = #{param.gid} AND date BETWEEN CONCAT(#{param.startDate}, ' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{param.endDate}, ' 23:59:59') GROUP BY os
